thig1.4:1.1: 'sikkha' first translated as 'train' then as 'discipline'. Perhaps "train yourself in the trainings" or even just "train yourself"
thig1.4:1.2: 'yoga' translated as 'attachments' here but as 'bonds' below. I would recommend picking one translation for both places.
thig1.4:1.4: "be one who" is not in the Pāli text. it reads fine just as "detached from all bonds, walk in the world free from corruptions."
